item.title: MODel Citizen
item.description:
The 'MODel Citizen' comes with one Zebra watch face and one Robin's Egg Blue strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made from a scra..

Price: $50.00
